data.name: Evolution - Stained Glass Cards
data.detailed_description: Give a gorgeous new look to your cards with these hand painted stained glass representations of each of the 17 base Cards.  You can opt to use these in all game modes, and other players will see them in Multiplayer when you play your Food Card or when they look at your Traits.
data.about_the_game: Give a gorgeous new look to your cards with these hand painted stained glass representations of each of the 17 base Cards.  You can opt to use these in all game modes, and other players will see them in Multiplayer when you play your Food Card or when they look at your Traits.
data.short_description: Customize your Cards with these hand painted Stained Glass skins.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64-Bit
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 8500
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.11
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.12
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
